name: Family Little Horror Show
description:
CONTENT WARNING! This game contains scenes of suicide, child abuse and animal death (it has censored mode turned on by default, which puts it behind black pixels. Can be disabled).

You were dragged into the World of Living by members of messed up family with their own problems. Fulfill their wishes until there is no one to bother you with.

A short adventure game about items fetching, NPC talking and cutscenes playing. The theme meant to show family unstable relationships which purposely lead to stability of another matter in the end.

Ludum Dare 49 entry. Theme "Unstable".
